attributes.action: Return all illegally acquired African Artifacts that are held in Britain to their rightful African owners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britain invaded African lands enslaved its peoples, stole their lands and removed their sacred artifacts and plundered their natural resources. It is time that Britain recognise that artifacts that are currently held in British museums are the properties of Africans, who as a people, are still in existence and who wishes to have their sacred artifacts returned to them.
